edu.bellarmine.rrk.Joust

Class Knight

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.bellarmine.rrk.Joust.Knight

  • public class Knight
extends java.lang.Object
    This class models a computer-based knight object that can joust against another computer-base knight object.
    Version:
    1.2 Lab11 - Knight Project Fall 2018
    Author:
    Rob Kelley

        public int joust()

      • setExperience

        public void setExperience(int experience)
        Setter for experience. Performs a bounds check to ensure value between 10 and 50 inclusive. If not, it sets it to 25.
        Parameters:
        experience -
